text: Hangman's House is a 1928 American romantic drama movie directed by John Ford and based on the novel by Brian Oswald Donn-Byrne. It stars Victor McLaglen, June Collyer, Larry Kent, Earle Fox, John Wayne and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1928 drama movies Category:1920s American romance movies Category:1920s American drama movies Category:1920s romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by John Ford Category:Movies set in Ireland
title: Hangman's House
